post.text: Thank you for your incredible support tonight, Winston-Salem, North Carolina! This is an unbelievable MOVEMENT - and we are going to MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN! -DJT

comment.author: Whitney
comment.text: #Trump2016 Trump Time!!! Just like our forefathers Mr T is beholden to America and together We Will Make America Great Again!!!
